release.action: NavigationStack is now Serializable, is it always should have been. For this to be possible, NavigationInstances have to be Serializable too, as they always should have been. This change cannot break existing correct applications, since NavigationInstances always should have been Serializable. If there are existing applications that add non-serializable NavigationInstances to the stack, this will show up as an exception when the application is serialized. This will have been the case with such applications before since those NavigationInstances will always have existed in sessions scope.
Changed the UIInstanceHandler#decode method so that it takes care of view mode 'deleted'.
First release with this version number scheme.
